title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         The Opening Day Parade held annually prior to the start of the Cincinnati Reds first game of the year. NPS Photo  Touring the Park & Cincinnati There are many things for visitors to do in the Greater Cincinnati area before, during or after your visit to William Howard Taft National Historic Site.  Browse the park Calendar to view what events are scheduled during your visit.  While you're at the park, you can tour the Taft Education Center to view memorabilia on display and learn more about the nation's 27th President.  Afterwards, stroll on over to the Taft birthplace house for a Guided Tour of the restored Victorian-era house to see what life was like around the turn of the 19th century.   From the Opening Day Parade for Major League Baseball's Cincinnati Reds, to touring the historic sites and museums throughout the Greater Cincinnati area, you're sure to find a Nearby Attraction or event to complement your time at William Howard Taft NHS.
